overview: They woke up that morning eager to explore. Out of town, in a country house far from the world, they'll feel each other as never before. Drinking wine with no glasses, from kiss to touch, to arouse, to desire – and even so still easy, still calm, still conscious of every centimeter of each others bodies. The secret places of pleasure. The secret pleasures of love.
tagline: Love and sex as never seen before
title: Eloi & Biel
